overview: Nina and Allen split everything in their lives 50/50 after their break-up to avoid any dramaâ€”everything, that is, except for their favorite local bar. Nina and Allen must compete in a ridiculous, tavern-style custody battle for their prized watering hole, in which lines will be drawn, sides will be chosen, and beers will be drunken.
tagline: Time to settle the score one drink at a time.
title: Bar Fight
